results.title: Role of activation of 5'-adenosine monophosphate-activated protein kinase in gastric ulcer healing in diabetic rats.
results.text_hl: The aim of the present study was to assess the effect of a drug that activates @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@, namely @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, in @<m>DISEASE_Stomach_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013276 @@@gastric ulcer@@@ healing in @CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@streptozotocin@@@-induced @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Gastroprotective effects of the insulin sensitizers rosiglitazone and metformin against indomethacin-induced gastric ulcers in Type 2 diabetic rats.
